sentences.en: All tough sinew, she looked like a hawk eyeing prey.
sentences.cn: 她肌肉强健, 看上去像只老鹰盯着它的猎物.

sentences.en: Collagen is the main protein of sinew, cartilage, bone and skin.

sentences.en: The cores are hard maple , the bellies horn and the backs covered with sinew.

sentences.en: The sinews on his neck stood out like knotted string.
